summary: Provides a lightweight evaluator that runs a SentenceTransformer model against a collection of reduced-size BEIR datasets, computes standard information‑retrieval metrics (e.g., MRR, nDCG, Recall@k) for each dataset and aggregates them, and formats the results for reporting.
business_intent: Enables fast, cost‑effective benchmarking of embedding‑based retrieval models so developers can quickly gauge performance and make model‑selection or tuning decisions before committing to full‑scale evaluation.
